review_text: I like this app. Although you still can't use it while syncing it completely freezes until that's done. This new update is fire! The lag used to be a real issue, it was extremely laggy. I've used keep on my laptop and now on my phone as well. Not to mention being unable to use the app when it's syncing because its literally stop responding until it's done. You'd stop an entry and wait several seconds, which made the app a pain. but now the download performance is smooth and more stable.

I love the app.! it was extremely laggy. The app is sooo much faster download! This is syncing happens pretty much every time you open the app, start, stop, or edit an entry, so it was a real pain to use. Not to mention being unable to use the app when it's syncing because its literally stop responding until it's done. You'd stop an entry and it'd be several seconds before it'd actually stop and those extra seconds are added to the entry. but now the soo much faster download and more stable.thnx

I really like the app.! This is syncing happens pretty much every time you open app, start, stop, or edit an entry, so it. I've used Keep on my laptop and now on my phone as well. but now the download is faster and more stable. You'd stop an entry and it'd be several seconds before it'd probably stop and those extra seconds are added to the entry. Thank you to everyone algorithms! Not to mention being unable to use the app when it's syncing because its literally stop responding until it's done👍

I love the app. This new updates is fire! it was extremely laggy. Not to mention being unable to use the app when it's syncing because its literally not responding until it's done. The app is sooo much faster download. You'd stop an entry and it'd be several seconds before it'd actually stop and those extra seconds are added to the entry. Thank you to everyone algorithms. This is syncing happens pretty much every time you open the app, start, stop, or edit an entry, so it was a real pain to use.

I love the app! This new update is seriously fire. It’s soo much faster and smoother now, especially during downloads and syncing. Before, it used to be extremely laggy and would freeze completely whenever syncing started. You’d stop an entry, and it’d take several seconds before it actually stopped, which was annoying. Now everything runs more efficiently, with only a brief pause while syncing. The overall experience feels polished and reliable. Huge thanks to everyone and the algorithms.Thanks

I love the app! This new update is fire! it was extremely laggy. Not to mention being unable to use the app when it's syncing because its literally stop responding until it's done. The app is sooo much faster download. You'd stop an entry and it'd be several seconds before it'd actually stop and those extra seconds are added to the entry. This is syncing happens pretty much every time you open the app, start, stop, or edit an entry, so it was a real pain to use. Thanks to everyone individually.

Disappointed with the service..it shows internal error everytime I try to convert my 4000 coins into gold...and they close the ticket without resolving the issue ..not expected this from paytm ...compain id is - 200000506009 No solution even after 7 days ...worst app..third class customer care service

I like this app. but now the download performance is smooth and more stable. You'd stop an entry and wait several seconds, which made the app a pain. I've used keep on my laptop and now on my phone as well. Not to mention being unable to use the app when it's syncing because its literally stop responding until it's done. Although you still can't use it while syncing it completely freezes until that's done. This new update is fire! The lag used to be a real issue, it was extremely laggy.
Excellent working and performances always for A better experience

I am facing a serious issue in the Paytm app. I deposited money into my Paytm account and received the “Deposit Received” notification, but the amount is not showing in my bank balance. When I tried to link my SBI (SBIN) bank account for UPI, the bank is not appearing in the list at all. My UPI is active, the mobile number is correct, and I have already updated the app, but the problem still exists. Please fix this issue as soon as possible. It is creating a lot of inconvenience for users

Truly the Best UPI Experience Paytm has become my go-to payments app. The transactions are super fast, the interface is smooth, and everything—from UPI to recharge to bill payments—works flawlessly. Rewards are actually useful, cashback drops on time, and security feels solid. Overall, a very reliable and convenient app for everyday payments. Highly recommended!
